mapper.select:
SELECT ID, HQ_CHAN_CODE, HQ_CHAN_NAME, START_MONTH, END_MONTH, ASSESS_TARGET, HZ_YEAR, YSDZ_XS, ZX_BT, HZ_MS, FW_FEE, RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX, RATE_NINE, RATE_TWELVE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE GROUP_ID_1 = #{regionCode} AND BUSINESS_KEY IS NULL
AND 1=2
SELECT HQ_CHAN_CODE,HQ_CHAN_NAME,START_MONTH, END_MONTH,ASSESS_TARGET,RATE_THREE,RATE_SIX,RATE_NINE,RATE_TWELVE, YSDZ_XS,ZX_BT,HZ_MS,FW_FEE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: update PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL set GROUP_ID_1=#{regionCode},GROUP_ID_1_NAME=#{regionName}, USERNAME=#{username},CREATE_TIME=${create_time}, START_MONTH=#{start_month,jdbcType=INTEGER},END_MONTH=#{end_month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ASSESS_TARGET=${assess_target},RATE_THREE=${rate_three}, RATE_SIX=${rate_six},RATE_NINE=${rate_nine}, RATE_TWELVE=${rate_twelve},YSDZ_XS=#{ysdz_xs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZX_BT=#{zx_bt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},HZ_MS=#{hz_ms}, FW_FEE=#{fw_fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HZ_YEAR=${hz_year} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE BUSINESS_KEY IS NULL AND GROUP_ID_1 = #{regionCode}
AND 1=2
mapper.update: UPDATE PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL SET BUSINESS_KEY = #{businessKey},ADD_STATE='1' WHERE GROUP_ID_1 = #{regionCode} AND BUSINESS_KEY IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT ID, HQ_CHAN_CODE, HQ_CHAN_NAME, START_MONTH, END_MONTH, ASSESS_TARGET, RATE_THREE, RATE_SIX, RATE_NINE, RATE_TWELVE, HZ_YEAR, YSDZ_XS, ZX_BT, HZ_MS, FW_FEE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE BUSINESS_KEY=#{businessKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL T SET T.ADD_STATE=#{status} WHERE T.BUSINESS_KEY = #{businessKey}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL WHERE GROUP_ID_1=#{regionCode} AND BUSINESS_KEY IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL SET BUSINESS_KEY=#{businessKey} WHERE GROUP_ID=#{regionCode} AND BUSINESS_KEY IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL SELECT * FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_YSDZ_NEW_CHANL_TEMP WHERE GROUP_ID_1=#{regionCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_INIT_FILE_MSG_TEMP SET INIT_ID=#{businessKey} WHERE USERNAME=#{username} AND INIT_ID IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_INIT_FILE_MSG SELECT * FROM PORTAL.TAB_INIT_FILE_MSG_TEMP WHERE USERNAME=#{username} AND INIT_ID=#{businessKey}
